content.rendered:
TOP MOTHER’S DAY BEAUTY GIFTS

My favorite top Mother’s Day beauty gifts list is here! Here at D’Lashes we have an AHHHMAZNING DEAL for the month of May! If you book a lash extensions appointment for you & your Mom during the month of May 2018 you both will receive 15% off! (Sorry there are no cancellations). How perfect is that!? Both you and your Mom will get an A-list beauty treatment here at D’Lashes.

On to my top Mother’s Day Beauty gifts + accessories. Click on the name of the products to shop. 1 Book your lash extensions appointment and shop D’Lashes beauty at DLashes.com 2 Say it with beautiful flowers! I recommend searching Google for “modern flowers” to find stunning flowers in your local area. 3 Dolce & Gabbana earrings for the fashion loving Mom! 4 A personal handwritten card from sugarpaper.com 5 D’Lashes scented candles make a perfect gift for Mom. 6 Tiffany & Co Eau de parfum gift set…how pretty! 7 D’Lashes beauty/lipgloss shop here. 8 Or you can get flowers and perfume all in one with this beautiful Marc Jacobs perfume.

Happy Mother’s Day! 

LOVE DIONNE
